question:
####UFAQ [Damon Stone]
Can the additional bad publicity from Corporate Scandal be removed?
answer:
No. The Corp is considered to have an additional bad publicity, even when they have none, but it does not exist for the purposes of being manipulated (such as removing it).

The Corp has 0 bad publicity when the Runner plays Corporate Scandal. The Corp plays [The All-Seeing I](/en/card/09022). Can the Runner remove the additional bad publicity from Corporate Scandal to prevent all resources from being trashed?
